entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:23 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 09:35 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -43.6°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 43 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 58 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
